data.title: The Deal Names Three White & Case M&A Partners "Top Rising Stars"
data.meta_description: The Deal, an award-winning financial news organization, announced that White & Case LLP M&A partners Morgan Hollins (Houston), Kristen Rohr and Suni Sreepada (both New York) have been nam
data.text:
The Deal, an award-winning financial news organization, announced that White & Case LLP M&A partners Morgan Hollins (Houston), Kristen Rohr and Suni Sreepada (both New York) have been named to its 2021 Top Rising Stars list.

The Deal's Top Rising Stars list honors top US-based, M&A-focused partners. In order to be eligible, individuals should have made partner between March 1, 2020, and February 28, 2021, and shown an ability to navigate complex dealmaking situations.

White & Case was ranked #1 in value for Global M&A and #1 in value for US M&A, according to Mergermarket, in the first quarter of 2021, is consistently ranked #1 on The American Lawyer's Diversity Scorecards and Law360â€™s Diversity Snapshots and was recognized as an "Outstanding Firm for Furthering Diversity and Inclusion" by Chambers USA 2019.
